contents.text: Welcome to HackerOne in San Francisco, trusted by Fortune 500 and Forbes Global 1000 companies to secure their critical applications.
If you are an existing customer seeking security support, press 1.
For help with an ongoing vulnerability report, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our security specialists.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my ongoing vulnerability report
Check the status of a vulnerability report I submitted and speak with a security specialist about next steps.
I need an update and to discuss remediation steps for a vulnerability I reported last week.
I need help following up on the vulnerability report I submitted.
I’d like to check the status of the vulnerability report I submitted last week.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account team.

navigationGoals: Clarify charges on last month’s invoice and billing details
Review billing charges on my account, discuss my invoice, and ask if I qualify for a veteran discount.
I want to get the latest invoice for our enterprise subscription and update our payment method.
I have questions about my latest invoice and need billing assistance.
I need a detailed breakdown of my latest invoice for security services.

contents.text: If you would like to learn about our platform or start a vulnerability disclosure or bug bounty program, press 2.
To schedule a live demo of the HackerOne platform, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our sales team for a demo.

navigationGoals: Book a live demo of the HackerOne platform for my team
Schedule a live demo of the HackerOne platform to assess how it can support our security program.
I'm looking to book a live demo of your bug bounty platform with API integration features.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your security platform.
I want to schedule a live demo of the HackerOne platform.

contents.text: To learn more about our bug bounty and vulnerability disclosure solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a solutions engineer.

navigationGoals: Get an overview of your bug bounty and vulnerability disclosure solutions
Get detailed information on HackerOne’s bug bounty and vulnerability disclosure solutions to launch a program.
I'd like technical details about your vulnerability disclosure orchestration and customization options.
I want to learn more about your bug bounty and vulnerability disclosure offerings.
I’m interested in learning how your bug bounty and vulnerability disclosure solutions work.
